formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: For men: BMR = 88.362 + (13.397 × weight in kg) + (4.799 × height in cm) - (5.677 × age in years) For women: BMR = 447.593 + (9.247 × weight in kg) + (3.098 × height in cm) - (4.330 × age in years)

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
